thread.title: Now hiring: Goodyear, AIG, IBM, more

title: Now hiring: Goodyear, AIG, IBM, more
text:
1. Structural engineer : Engineering Design Technologies, Inc. seeks a Structural Engineer. Duties include planning, designing, drafting and directing civil engineering projects. Engineer will analyze terrain, hydrological characteristics and other topographical and geologic data. [ Apply now ]
2. Automotive mechanic/technician : Goodyear of Buckhead is looking for a skilled technician with a talent for diagnosing vehicle issues, for instance, drivability, suspension, air conditioning, brakes, cooling systems and all aspects of automotive maintenance and repair. [ Apply now ]
3. Software engineering team lead : Accenture LLP seeks a software engineering team lead in Atlanta to gather business requisitions from clientele and translate them into technical needs to automate/improve existing client computer systems. [ Apply now ]
4. Front office coordinator : Old Milton Dental of Alpharetta is seeking an energetic professional to join their front office team. Great patient communication, dependability and responsibility are needed. Must have dental experience to be considered, insurance. [ Apply now ]
5. Software test engineer : Open Systems of Alpharetta is looking for an engineer to t est and design in-vehicle infotainment systdm specifications. [ Apply now ]
6. Industrial electrician : EPI Breads is currently seeking and industrial electrician to join the maintenance personnel for the Atlanta Plant. [ Apply now ]
7. LPN/RN/CMA : Healthcare Service is looking for a LPN/RN/CMA to join their committed team to bring the best possible care to their patients. [ Apply now ]
8. CDL Driver : Best Cheer Stone is looking for a driver. Must possess a good driving record and CDL. [ Apply now ]
9. Service technician/electrician : Established commercial electrical contracting and service company in Alpharetta is seeking qualified service electricians, industrial and motor control experience a plus. [ Apply now ]
10. Software engineer : IBM of Sandy Springs is looking for a software developer for Linux-based security appliances. [ Apply now ]
11. Security officers : Popular Atlanta night club needs security officers. Must have two years experience in security or related areas. [ Apply now ]
Visit AJCJobs.com for more on employment in metro Atlanta.
